title: Mainly monkeys
creator_credit: Louise Jonas, Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Rob McCubbin
brief_description: Filmed in close detail at the Royal Melbourne Zoological Gardens, the Sir Colin Mackenzie Fauna Park, Healesville and the Royal Botanic Gardens, Melbourne, with minimal evidence of enclosures. Shows groups of monkeys and other primates living in trees, their feeding and grooming habits, their method of communication and care of the young. Adapted from “A Zoo in the trees”. Non-narrated using natural sound. Suitable for middle and upper pprimary levels.
